ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] fortran 77 demo program
ygData.msgSnippet: Michele, The f77 demo program needs a small update to work with Cantera 1.6. Do this: 1. In file demo_ftnlib.cpp add the line #include

Michele,

The f77 demo program needs a small update to work with Cantera 1.=
6. Do 
this:

1. In file "demo_ftnlib.cpp" add the line

#include <cantera/=
Cantera.h>

before the first include statement.

2. If you are using the gn=
u f77 compiler, also add 
"-fno-second-underscore" to "FORT_FLAGS" in demo.=
mak


This should fix the problem.

Dave
